changeSet.author: dkurmanov
changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists job_hunt.job_history ( id serial primary key, vacancy_id bigint not null, hr_id bigint not null, employee_id bigint not null, created_at timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
constraint fk_job_history_vacancy foreign key (vacancy_id) references job_hunt.vacancy(id), constraint fk_job_history_employee foreign key (employee_id) references job_hunt.employee(id), constraint fk_job_history_hr foreign key (hr_id) references job_hunt.hr_employee(id) );
